title: UPDATE 3-Super Rugby summaries
text: April 14, 2018 / 10:25 AM / Updated 14 minutes ago UPDATE 6-Super Rugby summaries Reuters Staff 3 Min Read Apr 14 (OPTA) - summaries from the Super Rugby matches on Saturday Sunwolves (10) 10 Tries: Lafaele (20) Conversions: Parker (22) Penalties: Tamura (3) Blues (5) 24 Tries: Hyland (27,75), Ioane (49), Papali'i (54) Conversions: Perofeta (50,55) Yellow cards: Tuipulotu (2) Referee: Nick Briant Rebels (14) 22 Tries: Meakes (9), Koroibete (17), Haylett-Petty (48) Conversions: Debreczeni (10,19) Penalties: Debreczeni (64) Yellow cards: Faulkner (55) Jaguares (3) 25 Tries: Cancelliere (50), Moyano (56), Ezcurra (73) Conversions: Sanchez (50,75) Penalties: Sanchez (7,44) Referee: Nic Berry Highlanders (12) 43 Tries: Sopoaga (6), Smith (24,67), Naholo (59), Frizell (69), Smith (82) Conversions: Sopoaga (25,68,70,83), Smith (60) Penalties: Sopoaga (47) Yellow cards: Sopoaga (51) Brumbies (10) 17 Tries: Naisarani (33), Powell (73) Conversions: Hawera (34,74) Penalties: Hawera (15) Referee: Ben O'keeffe Waratahs (13) 37 Tries: Gordon (35), Naiyaravoro (47,71), Johnson-Holmes (80) Conversions: Foley (36,49,71,81) Penalties: Foley (3,17,54) Reds (6) 16 Tries: Daugunu (58) Conversions: Lance (59) Penalties: Tuttle (24,39,44) Referee: Angus Gardner Sharks (14:15) Bulls Ground: Kings Park Stadium
